longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival.
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission and transit refused to holders of Iraqi "S" series
  passports.

Visa required.

Minors:
- Minors below the age of 18 who are not accompanied by their
  legal guardian need an authorisation from their guardian
vaccination:
Yellow fever vaccination is required for all passengers.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers over 9
  months of age.
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: C.
